Jupyter Notebook Cheat Sheet

This document provides a comprehensive list of magic functions, shortcuts, and commands for the Jupyter Notebook web application. It explains how to use these features to create, share, and analyze documents that contain live code, equations, visualizations, and narrative text.

Key Concepts:

  • Magic Functions in Jupyter Notebook
  • IPython Shortcuts
  • Python Syntax
  • Data Analysis and Visualization
